title: Drawing, "Design for Knotted Pile Rug"
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: In tall,vertical format, 5 diamond shapes of different sizes (smallest at lower end, two overlapping diamonds at upper end), looking like garden parterres in perspective, on white-flecked ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Knotted Pile Rug".
Pastel/crayon, graphite on tan paper. Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives. 1993-121-56.
